__e: You have to keep feeding the beast. I mean, for what?
You don't get a man's hopes up like that, and then just...
I tried to fan the embers of passion, lord knows I tried.
That is what fuels your blood tie to him.
Your silence only fuels the fire.
You stole her design to help power your security system.
So I don't know if I can-- I don't want you to get your hopes up.
It's what they use to power their weapons, their ships, their everything.
I was happy bartending, and then you had to get my hopes up.
They took away my food service license-- and not just for my truck, but for my restaurant, too!
No, I mean, there are five mouths to feed, with just one person in the house working!
The official reason is I have an eating disorder and they think a new school environment will help.
